citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1 pm on
01/20/2016.
Spoke to Licensee's father who said Daniel was out of town and normally works until 4:45pm M-F. At this time,
Daniel is the only one who can accompany inspection.
